lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and the Democrats, helped by a 2014 Supreme Court decision, are extending their advantage over Republicans in campaign donations.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and RACHEL SHOREY

headline.print_headline: Democrats Are Raking In Money, Thanks to a Lawsuit by Republicans
headline.main: Democrats Rake In Money, Thanks to Suit by Republicans

snippet: Hillary Clinton and the Democrats, helped by a 2014 Supreme Court decision, are extending their advantage over Republicans in campaign donations....
abstract: Federal Election Commission reports reveal Democratic Party leaders and Hillary Clinton are taking advantage of Supreme Court ruling in McCutcheon v FEC to funnel tens of millions of dollars from wealthy donors to handful of swing states; ruling struck down limits on combined amount one person could donate to all federal candidates and parties in election cycle; Democrats have denounced ruling yet are apparently using it to expand fund-raising advantage over Republicans in 2016 presidential race.
